questions.question: What does CPU stand for?
Which of the following is a programming language?
What is the purpose of RAM in a computer?
options: Temporary storage of data and instructions for the CPU
questions.answer: b) Temporary storage of data and instructions for the CPU

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a type of computer network?
What does GUI stand for?
Which of the following is an output device?
What is the purpose of an operating system?
What is the binary equivalent of the decimal number 10?
What does HTML stand for?
Which of the following is NOT a type of computer memory?
Which of the following is an example of an input device?
What is the purpose of a firewall in a computer network?
options: To prevent physical damage to the computer
To filter network traffic and protect against unauthorized access
To enhance the speed of data transfer
To increase the storage capacity of the computer
questions.answer: b) To filter network traffic and protect against unauthorized access

questions.question: What is the function of an IP address in computer networking?
options: To identify the user of the computer
To identify the location of the computer on the network
questions.answer: b) To identify the location of the computer on the network

questions.question: Which of the following is a file format used for images?
What is the purpose of a compiler in programming?
options: To convert source code into machine code
To optimize the performance of the code
To provide a user interface for the code
questions.answer: a) To convert source code into machine code

questions.question: Which of the following is a cloud computing service model?
What is the purpose of a URL in web browsing?
options: To identify the type of content being requested
To specify the location of the content on the web server
To control the appearance of the web page
questions.answer: b) To specify the location of the content on the web server
